Action.author: holzeis
Action.body: I've created a change request at https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/c/fabric-sdk-node/+/32039

Action.author: heatherp
Action.body: Hi ~holzeis , I am working through the node sdk with the maintainers, are you still actively working on this?

Action.author: richard.holzeis
Action.body: Hi ~heatherp , well I've proposed a fix and would be happy to see it merged. Let me know if you need any additional input.
